content.query:
USE gold_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateViewServerless_gold @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

	SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
	SELECT *
	FROM
		OPENROWSET(
			BULK ''https://salesdlprod1.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @ViewName + '/'',
			FORMAT = ''DELTA''
		) AS [result]
	'

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO
